name: Phasegate
description:
On your routine mission to the gamma sector delievering a new phasegate, a mysterious enemy blocks your path. Will you save the phasegate and escape harm?

Pick up yellow platforms to heal, the top left bar will fill up, when completely filled you will gain 1 life point.

Top right hearts are your hp.

Bottom left stars are the bosses health for the current phase.

Picking up yellow platforms also increases the chance that the boss will enter he vulnerability phase.
